itunes:subtitle: Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they sit with pediatrician and best-selling author, Meg Meeker, MD to talk about what parents need most to raise kids in today's culture. Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show...
itunes:summary:
Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they sit with pediatrician and best-selling author, Meg Meeker, MD to talk about what parents need most to raise kids in today's culture.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes HERE. 

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com
